name: The Cup of Tea
description:
The Cup of Tea Very epic game where you can suffer and try to speed-run it.

Singleplayer:

There had to be achievements (they are still not there) and about 100 levels (there is 5 levels) but at least it's kinda pain playing it, so yeah, cool I guess.
+ It's Cross-platform. More native games for Linux Yay!

Multiplayer:

It's bad. It will be once a sandbox multiplayer, but please don't play it now...

(if u wanna play it on mac uhh contact me somehow)
